message.content:
Just noticed the actions npm package is not released:
https://github.com/tuist/tuist/actions/runs/21873609263/job/63136189337

Let's change the approach, instead of pushing to the NPM package, I want you to push the new versions to https://github.com/tuist/agent-skills using one of the GitHub tokens that we have as secrets and create the version there. Remove the package.json and the npm publish piece

content.text: Let me start by understanding the current setup - the skills package, the GitHub Actions workflow, and what needs to change.

input.prompt:

Be thorough - I need to understand the full publish pipeline for the skills/agent-skills NPM package.

1‚Üí# git-cliff ~ configuration file
     2‚Üí# https://git-cliff.org/docs/configuration
     3‚Üí
     4‚Üí[bump]
     5‚Üíinitial_tag = "0.1.0"
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üí[remote.github]
     8‚Üíowner = "tuist"
     9‚Üírepo = "tuist"
    10‚Üí
    11‚Üí[changelog]
    12‚Üí# template for the changelog header
    13‚Üíheader = """
    14‚Üí# Changelog
    15‚Üí
    16‚ÜíAll notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
    17‚Üí"""
    18‚Üí# template for the changelog body
    19‚Üí# https://keats.github.io/tera/docs/#introduction
    20‚Üíbody = """
    21‚Üí## What's Changed
    22‚Üí
    23‚Üí{%- if version %} in {{ version }}{%- endif -%}
    24‚Üí<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->
    25‚Üí{% for group, commits in commits | group_by(attribute="group") %}
    26‚Üí### {{ group | striptags | trim }}
    27‚Üí{% for commit in commits %}
    28‚Üí  {% if commit.github.pr_title -%}
    29‚Üí    {%- set commit_message = commit.github.pr_title -%}
    30‚Üí  {%- else -%}
    31‚Üí    {%- set commit_message = commit.message -%}
    32‚Üí  {%- endif -%}
    33‚Üí  * {{ commit_message | split(pat="\n") | first | trim }}\
    34‚Üí    {% if commit.github.username %} by [@{{ commit.github.username }}](https://github.com/{{ commit.github.username }}){%- endif -%}
    35‚Üí    {% if commit.github.pr_number %} in \
    36‚Üí      [#{{ commit.github.pr_number }}]({{ self::remote_url() }}/pull/{{ commit.github.pr_number }}) \
    37‚Üí    {%- endif %}
    38‚Üí{%- endfor -%}
    39‚Üí{% endfor %}
    40‚Üí
    41‚Üí{%- if github -%}
    42‚Üí{% if github.contributors | filter(attribute="is_first_time", value=true) | length != 0 %}
    43‚Üí  {% raw %}\n{% endraw -%}
    44‚Üí  ## New Contributors
    45‚Üí{%- endif %}\
    46‚Üí{% for contributor in github.contributors | filter(attribute="is_first_time", value=true) %}
    47‚Üí  * [@{{ contributor.username }}](https://github.com/{{ contributor.username }}) made their first contribution
    48‚Üí    {%- if contributor.pr_number %} in \
    49‚Üí      [#{{ contributor.pr_number }}]({{ self::remote_url() }}/pull/{{ contributor.pr_number }}) \
    50‚Üí    {%- endif %}
    51‚Üí{%- endfor -%}
    52‚Üí{%- endif -%}
    53‚Üí
    54‚Üí{% if version %}
    55‚Üí    {% if previous.version %}
    56‚Üí      **Full Changelog**: {{ self::remote_url() }}/compare/{{ previous.version }}...{{ version }}
    57‚Üí    {% endif %}
    58‚Üí{% else -%}
    59‚Üí  {% raw %}\n{% endraw %}
    60‚Üí{% endif %}
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üí{%- macro remote_url() -%}
    63‚Üí  https://github.com/{{ remote.github.owner }}/{{ remote.github.repo }}
    64‚Üí{%- endmacro -%}
    65‚Üí"""
    66‚Üí# remove the leading and trailing whitespace from the template
    67‚Üítrim = true
    68‚Üí# changelog footer
    69‚Üífooter = """
    70‚Üí<!-- generated by git-cliff -->
    71‚Üí"""
    72‚Üí# postprocessors
    73‚Üípostprocessors = [
    74‚Üí    # Remove commit type prefix from changelog entries
    75‚Üí    { pattern = '\* (feat|fix|docs?|perf|refactor|style|test|chore|ci)(\([^)]*\))?:\s*', replace = "* " },
    76‚Üí]
    77‚Üí
    78‚Üí[git]
    79‚Üí# parse the commits based on https://www.conventionalcommits.org
    80‚Üíconventional_commits = true
    81‚Üí# filter out the commits that are not conventional
    82‚Üífilter_unconventional = true
    83‚Üí# process each line of a commit as an individual commit
    84‚Üísplit_commits = false
    85‚Üí# regex for preprocessing the commit messages
    86‚Üícommit_preprocessors = [
    87‚Üí    # remove issue numbers from commits
    88‚Üí    { pattern = '\((\w+\s)?#([0-9]+)\)', replace = "" },
    89‚Üí]
    90‚Üí# regex for parsing and grouping commits
    91‚Üícommit_parsers = [
    92‚Üí    # Include commits with (skills) scope (supports multi-scope like "feat(cli,skills)")
    93‚Üí    { message = "^feat\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 0 -->‚õ∞Ô∏è  Features" },
    94‚Üí    { message = "^fix\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 1 -->üêõ Bug Fixes" },
    95‚Üí    { message = "^docs?\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 3 -->üìö Documentation" },
    96‚Üí    { message = "^perf\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 4 -->‚ö° Performance" },
    97‚Üí    { message = "^refactor\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 2 -->üöú Refactor" },
    98‚Üí    { message = "^style\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 5 -->üé® Styling" },
    99‚Üí    { message = "^test\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 6 -->üß™ Testing" },
   100‚Üí    { message = "^chore\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", skip = true },
   101‚Üí    { message = "^ci\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", skip = true },
   102‚Üí    # Skip any other scoped commits
   103‚Üí    { message = "^[a-z]+\\([^)]+\\)", skip = true },
   104‚Üí]
   105‚Üí# protect breaking changes from being skipped due to matching a skipping commit_parser
   106‚Üíprotect_breaking_commits = false
   107‚Üí# filter out the commits that are not matched by commit parsers
   108‚Üífilter_commits = true
   109‚Üí# regex for matching git tags
   110‚Üítag_pattern = "skills@[0-9].*"
   111‚Üí# regex for skipping tags
   112‚Üískip_tags = "beta|alpha"
   113‚Üí# regex for ignoring tags
   114‚Üíignore_tags = "rc"
   115‚Üí# sort the tags topologically
   116‚Üítopo_order = false
   117‚Üí# sort the commits inside sections by oldest/newest order
   118‚Üísort_commits = "newest"
   119‚Üí

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

1‚Üíname: Release
     2‚Üí
     3‚Üíon:
     4‚Üí  push:
     5‚Üí    branches:
     6‚Üí      - main
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üípermissions:
     9‚Üí  id-token: write
    10‚Üí  contents: write
    11‚Üí  pull-requests: read
    12‚Üí  statuses: write
    13‚Üí  packages: write
    14‚Üí
    15‚Üíconcurrency:
    16‚Üí  group: release-workflow-${{ github.ref }}
    17‚Üí  cancel-in-progress: true
    18‚Üí
    19‚Üíenv:
    20‚Üí  PNPM_HOME: ~/.pnpm
    21‚Üí  TUIST_ENABLE_CACHING: "true"
    22‚Üí
    23‚Üíjobs:
    24‚Üí  check-releases:
    25‚Üí    name: Check for releasable changes
    26‚Üí    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    27‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 15
    28‚Üí    outputs:
    29‚Üí      cli-should-release: ${{ steps.cli-check.outputs.should-release }}
    30‚Üí      cli-next-version: ${{ steps.cli-check.outputs.next-version }}
    31‚Üí      cli-next-version-number: ${{ steps.cli-check.outputs.next-version-number }}
    32‚Üí      app-should-release: ${{ steps.app-check.outputs.should-release }}
    33‚Üí      app-next-version: ${{ steps.app-check.outputs.next-version }}
    34‚Üí      app-next-version-number: ${{ steps.app-check.outputs.next-version-number }}
    35‚Üí      server-should-release: ${{ steps.server-check.outputs.should-release }}
    36‚Üí      server-next-version: ${{ steps.server-check.outputs.next-version }}
    37‚Üí      server-next-version-number: ${{ steps.server-check.outputs.next-version-number }}
    38‚Üí      cache-should-release: ${{ steps.cache-check.outputs.should-release }}
    39‚Üí      cache-next-version: ${{ steps.cache-check.outputs.next-version }}
    40‚Üí      cache-next-version-number: ${{ steps.cache-check.outputs.next-version-number }}
    41‚Üí      gradle-should-release: ${{ steps.gradle-check.outputs.should-release }}
    42‚Üí      gradle-next-version: ${{ steps.gradle-check.outputs.next-version }}
    43‚Üí      gradle-next-version-number: ${{ steps.gradle-check.outputs.next-version-number }}
    44‚Üí      skills-should-release: ${{ steps.skills-check.outputs.should-release }}
    45‚Üí      skills-next-version: ${{ steps.skills-check.outputs.next-version }}
    46‚Üí      skills-next-version-number: ${{ steps.skills-check.outputs.next-version-number }}
    47‚Üí      should-release-any: ${{ steps.check-any.outputs.should-release }}
    48‚Üí    steps:
    49‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    50‚Üí        with:
    51‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
    52‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
    53‚Üí
    54‚Üí      - name: Check CLI for releasable changes
    55‚Üí        id: cli-check
    56‚Üí        run: |
    57‚Üí          cd cli
    58‚Üí          # Get the latest CLI version tag dynamically
    59‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E '^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$' | sort -V | tail -n1 || echo "0.0.0")
    60‚Üí
    61‚Üí          # Check if there are any releasable changes by generating changelog
    62‚Üí          CHANGELOG=$(git cliff --include-path "cli/**/*" --include-path ".xcode-version-releases" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD || echo "")
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí          # Only bump version if there are actual release notes
    65‚Üí          if echo "$CHANGELOG" | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,/<!-- generated by git-cliff -->/p' | grep -qE '^\*'; then
    66‚Üí            NEXT_VERSION=$(git cliff --include-path "cli/**/*" --include-path ".xcode-version-releases" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bumped-version 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD)
    67‚Üí          else
    68‚Üí            NEXT_VERSION="$LATEST_VERSION"
    69‚Üí          fi
    70‚Üí
    71‚Üí          echo "Latest CLI version: $LATEST_VERSION"
    72‚Üí          echo "Next CLI version: $NEXT_VERSION"
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí          # Validate that next version is actually newer
    75‚Üí          if [ "$NEXT_VERSION" = "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
    76‚Üí            echo "No CLI version change detected (versions are equal)"
    77‚Üí            echo "should-release=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    78‚Üí            echo "next-version=$LATEST_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    79‚Üí            echo "next-version-number=$LATEST_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    80‚Üí          elif [ "$(printf '%s\n' "$LATEST_VERSION" "$NEXT_VERSION" | sort -V | head -n1)" = "$NEXT_VERSION" ]; then
    81‚Üí            echo "ERROR: Next version ($NEXT_VERSION) is older than latest version ($LATEST_VERSION)"
    82‚Üí            echo "should-release=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    83‚Üí            echo "next-version=$LATEST_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    84‚Üí            echo "next-version-number=$LATEST_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    85‚Üí          else
    86‚Üí            echo "CLI version bump detected: $LATEST_VERSION -> $NEXT_VERSION"
    87‚Üí            echo "should-release=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    88‚Üí            echo "next-version=$NEXT_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    89‚Üí            echo "next-version-number=$NEXT_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
    90‚Üí          fi
    91‚Üí
    92‚Üí      - name: Check App for releasable changes
    93‚Üí        id: app-check
    94‚Üí        run: |
    95‚Üí          cd app
    96‚Üí          # Get the latest app version tag
    97‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^app@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
    98‚Üí
    99‚Üí          # Check if there are any releasable changes by generating changelog
   100‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   101‚Üí            CHANGELOG=$(git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD || echo "")
   102‚Üí          else
   103‚Üí            CHANGELOG=$(git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null || echo "")
   104‚Üí          fi
   105‚Üí
   106‚Üí          # Only bump version if there are actual release notes
   107‚Üí          if echo "$CHANGELOG" | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,/<!-- generated by git-cliff -->/p' | grep -qE '^\*'; then
   108‚Üí            if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   109‚Üí              NEXT_VERSION=$(git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bumped-version 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD)
   110‚Üí            else
   111‚Üí              NEXT_VERSION=$(git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bumped-version 2>/dev/null)
   112‚Üí            fi
   113‚Üí          else
   114‚Üí            if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   115‚Üí              NEXT_VERSION="${LATEST_VERSION#app@}"
   116‚Üí            else
   117‚Üí              NEXT_VERSION="0.1.0"
   118‚Üí            fi
   119‚Üí          fi
   120‚Üí
   121‚Üí          # Add app@ prefix if not present and remove any duplicate prefixes
   122‚Üí          if [[ "$NEXT_VERSION" == app@* ]]; then
   123‚Üí            # If it already has app@ prefix, extract just the version number and re-add single prefix
   124‚Üí            VERSION_NUM="${NEXT_VERSION#app@}"
   125‚Üí            # Remove any additional app@ prefixes
   126‚Üí            while [[ "$VERSION_NUM" == app@* ]]; do
   127‚Üí              VERSION_NUM="${VERSION_NUM#app@}"
   128‚Üí            done
   129‚Üí            NEXT_VERSION="app@$VERSION_NUM"
   130‚Üí          else
   131‚Üí            NEXT_VERSION="app@$NEXT_VERSION"
   132‚Üí          fi
   133‚Üí
   134‚Üí          echo "Latest App version: ${LATEST_VERSION:-none}"
   135‚Üí          echo "Next App version: $NEXT_VERSION"
   136‚Üí
   137‚Üí          # Validate and compare versions
   138‚Üí          if [ -z "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   139‚Üí            # No previous version, this is the first release
   140‚Üí            echo "First App release: $NEXT_VERSION"
   141‚Üí            echo "should-release=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   142‚Üí            echo "next-version=$NEXT_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   143‚Üí            echo "next-version-number=${NEXT_VERSION#app@}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   144‚Üí          elif [ "$NEXT_VERSION" = "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   145‚Üí            echo "No App version change detected (versions are equal)"
   146‚Üí            echo "should-release=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   147‚Üí            echo "next-version=$LATEST_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   148‚Üí            echo "next-version-number=${LATEST_VERSION#app@}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   149‚Üí          else
   150‚Üí            echo "App version bump detected: $LATEST_VERSION -> $NEXT_VERSION"
   151‚Üí            echo "should-release=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   152‚Üí            echo "next-version=$NEXT_VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   153‚Üí            echo "next-version-number=${NEXT_VERSION#app@}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   154‚Üí          fi

   392‚Üí      - name: Check if any component needs release
   393‚Üí        id: check-any
   394‚Üí        run: |
   395‚Üí          if [ "${{ steps.cli-check.outputs.should-release }}" == "true" ] || \
   396‚Üí             [ "${{ steps.app-check.outputs.should-release }}" == "true" ] || \
   397‚Üí             [ "${{ steps.server-check.outputs.should-release }}" == "true" ] || \
   398‚Üí             [ "${{ steps.cache-check.outputs.should-release }}" == "true" ] || \
   399‚Üí             [ "${{ steps.gradle-check.outputs.should-release }}" == "true" ] || \
   400‚Üí             [ "${{ steps.skills-check.outputs.should-release }}" == "true" ]; then
   401‚Üí            echo "At least one component needs release"
   402‚Üí            echo "should-release=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   403‚Üí          else
   404‚Üí            echo "No components need release"
   405‚Üí            echo "should-release=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   406‚Üí          fi
   407‚Üí
   408‚Üí  release-cli:
   409‚Üí    name: Release CLI
   410‚Üí    needs: check-releases
   411‚Üí    if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true'
   412‚Üí    runs-on: namespace-profile-default-macos
   413‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 30
   414‚Üí    env:
   415‚Üí      GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   416‚Üí    outputs:
   417‚Üí      artifacts-uploaded: ${{ steps.upload.outputs.uploaded }}
   418‚Üí      release-notes: ${{ steps.release-notes.outputs.RELEASE_NOTES }}
   419‚Üí    steps:
   420‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   421‚Üí        with:
   422‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   423‚Üí          token: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   424‚Üí      - name: Select Xcode
   425‚Üí        run: sudo xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode_$(cat .xcode-version-releases).app
   426‚Üí      - name: Restore cache
   427‚Üí        id: cache-restore
   428‚Üí        uses: actions/cache/restore@v4
   429‚Üí        with:
   430‚Üí          path: .build
   431‚Üí          key: ${{ runner.os }}-cli-release-${{ hashFiles('.xcode-version-releases') }}-${{ hashFiles('Package.resolved') }}
   432‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
   433‚Üí      - name: Authenticate with Tuist
   434‚Üí        run: tuist auth login
   435‚Üí      - name: Setup Tuist cache
   436‚Üí        run: tuist setup cache
   437‚Üí      - name: Install Tuist dependencies
   438‚Üí        if: steps.cache-restore.outputs.cache-matched-key == ''
   439‚Üí        run: tuist install
   440‚Üí      - name: Initialize TuistCacheEE submodule
   441‚Üí        env:
   442‚Üí          TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   443‚Üí        run: mise run cli:ee
   444‚Üí      - name: Get release notes
   445‚Üí        id: release-notes
   446‚Üí        working-directory: cli
   447‚Üí        run: |
   448‚Üí          # Get the latest CLI version tag dynamically
   449‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E '^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$' | sort -V | tail -n1 || echo "0.0.0")
   450‚Üí          echo "RELEASE_NOTES<<EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   451‚Üí          git cliff --include-path "cli/**/*" --include-path ".xcode-version-releases" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   452‚Üí          echo "EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   453‚Üí
   454‚Üí      - name: Update version in Constants.swift
   455‚Üí        run: |
   456‚Üí          sed -i '' -e "s/@TaskLocal public static var version: String! = \".*\"/@TaskLocal public static var version: String! = \"${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version }}\"/" "cli/Sources/TuistConstants/Constants.swift"
   457‚Üí
   458‚Üí      - name: Update CHANGELOG.md
   459‚Üí        working-directory: cli
   460‚Üí        run: git cliff --include-path "cli/**/*" --include-path ".xcode-version-releases" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null
   461‚Üí
   462‚Üí      - name: Bundle CLI
   463‚Üí        run: mise run cli:bundle
   464‚Üí        env:

   466‚Üí
   467‚Üí      - name: Update mise.toml
   468‚Üí        run: |
   469‚Üí          sed -i '' "s/tuist = \".*\"/tuist = \"${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version }}\"/" mise.toml
   470‚Üí
   471‚Üí      - name: Save cache
   472‚Üí        id: cache-save
   473‚Üí        uses: actions/cache/save@v4
   474‚Üí        with:
   475‚Üí          path: .build
   476‚Üí          key: ${{ steps.cache-restore.outputs.cache-primary-key }}
   477‚Üí
   478‚Üí      - name: Upload CLI artifacts
   479‚Üí        id: upload
   480‚Üí        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   481‚Üí        with:
   482‚Üí          name: cli-artifacts
   483‚Üí          path: |
   484‚Üí            cli/CHANGELOG.md
   485‚Üí            cli/Sources/TuistConstants/Constants.swift
   486‚Üí            mise.toml
   487‚Üí            build/ProjectDescription.xcframework.zip
   488‚Üí            build/tuist.zip
   489‚Üí            build/SHASUMS256.txt
   490‚Üí            build/SHASUMS512.txt
   491‚Üí          retention-days: 1
   492‚Üí
   493‚Üí  release-cli-linux:
   494‚Üí    name: Release CLI (Linux ${{ matrix.arch }})
   495‚Üí    needs: check-releases
   496‚Üí    if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true'
   497‚Üí    runs-on: ${{ matrix.runner }}
   498‚Üí    container:
   499‚Üí      image: swift:6.1
   500‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 30
   501‚Üí    strategy:
   502‚Üí      matrix:
   503‚Üí        include:
   504‚Üí          - arch: x86_64
   505‚Üí            runner: ubuntu-latest
   506‚Üí          - arch: aarch64
   507‚Üí            runner: ubuntu-24.04-arm
   508‚Üí    steps:
   509‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   510‚Üí        with:
   511‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   512‚Üí          token: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   513‚Üí
   514‚Üí      - name: Restore cache
   515‚Üí        id: cache-restore
   516‚Üí        uses: actions/cache/restore@v4
   517‚Üí        with:
   518‚Üí          path: .build
   519‚Üí          key: linux-${{ matrix.arch }}-cli-release-${{ hashFiles('Package.resolved') }}
   520‚Üí
   521‚Üí      - name: Update version in Constants.swift
   522‚Üí        run: |
   523‚Üí          sed -i "s/@TaskLocal public static var version: String! = \".*\"/@TaskLocal public static var version: String! = \"${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version }}\"/" "cli/Sources/TuistConstants/Constants.swift"
   524‚Üí
   525‚Üí      - name: Bundle CLI
   526‚Üí        run: ./mise/tasks/cli/bundle-linux.sh
   527‚Üí
   528‚Üí      - name: Save cache
   529‚Üí        uses: actions/cache/save@v4
   530‚Üí        with:
   531‚Üí          path: .build
   532‚Üí          key: ${{ steps.cache-restore.outputs.cache-primary-key }}
   533‚Üí
   534‚Üí      - name: Upload CLI Linux artifacts
   535‚Üí        id: upload
   536‚Üí        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   537‚Üí        with:
   538‚Üí          name: cli-linux-${{ matrix.arch }}-artifacts
   539‚Üí          path: |
   540‚Üí            build/tuist-linux-${{ matrix.arch }}.tar.gz
   541‚Üí            build/SHASUMS256.txt
   542‚Üí            build/SHASUMS512.txt
   543‚Üí          retention-days: 1
   544‚Üí
   545‚Üí  release-app:
   546‚Üí    name: Release App
   547‚Üí    needs: check-releases
   548‚Üí    if: needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release == 'true'
   549‚Üí    runs-on: macos-26
   550‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 50
   551‚Üí    env:
   552‚Üí      GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   553‚Üí      OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN }}
   554‚Üí    outputs:
   555‚Üí      artifacts-uploaded: ${{ steps.upload.outputs.uploaded }}
   556‚Üí      release-notes: ${{ steps.release-notes.outputs.RELEASE_NOTES }}
   557‚Üí    steps:
   558‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   559‚Üí        with:
   560‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   561‚Üí          token: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   562‚Üí      - name: Select Xcode
   563‚Üí        run: sudo xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode_$(cat .xcode-version).app
   564‚Üí      - name: Install create-dmg
   565‚Üí        run: brew install create-dmg
   566‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
   567‚Üí      - name: Authenticate with Tuist
   568‚Üí        run: tuist auth login
   569‚Üí      - name: Setup Tuist cache
   570‚Üí        run: tuist setup cache
   571‚Üí      - name: Install dependencies
   572‚Üí        run: tuist install
   573‚Üí
   574‚Üí      - name: Get release notes
   575‚Üí        id: release-notes
   576‚Üí        working-directory: app
   577‚Üí        run: |
   578‚Üí          # Get the latest app version tag
   579‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^app@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   580‚Üí
   581‚Üí          echo "RELEASE_NOTES<<EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   582‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   583‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   584‚Üí          else
   585‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   586‚Üí          fi
   587‚Üí          echo "EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   588‚Üí
   589‚Üí      - name: Update version
   590‚Üí        working-directory: app
   591‚Üí        run: |
   592‚Üí          VERSION_NUMBER="${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version }}"
   593‚Üí          VERSION_NUMBER="${VERSION_NUMBER#app@}"
   594‚Üí          sed -i '' -e "s/CFBundleShortVersionString.*/CFBundleShortVersionString\": \"$VERSION_NUMBER\",/g" "Project.swift"
   595‚Üí          sed -i '' -e "s/CFBundleVersion.*/CFBundleVersion\": \"${{ github.run_number }}\",/g" "Project.swift"
   596‚Üí
   597‚Üí      - name: Update CHANGELOG.md
   598‚Üí        working-directory: app
   599‚Üí        run: |
   600‚Üí          # Get the latest app version tag
   601‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^app@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   602‚Üí
   603‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   604‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD
   605‚Üí          else
   606‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "app/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null
   607‚Üí          fi
   608‚Üí
   609‚Üí      - name: Bundle macOS app
   610‚Üí        run: mise run app:bundle
   611‚Üí        env:
   612‚Üí          OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN }}
   613‚Üí
   614‚Üí      - name: Generate Sparkle appcast
   615‚Üí        run: op read "op://tuist/Tuist App Private Sparkle Key/credential" | .build/artifacts/sparkle-project.Sparkle/Sparkle/bin/generate_appcast --link https://github.com/tuist/tuist/releases --download-url-prefix https://github.com/tuist/tuist/releases/download/${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version }}/Tuist.dmg -o app/appcast.xml app/build/artifacts --ed-key-file -
   616‚Üí
   617‚Üí      - name: Upload App artifacts
   618‚Üí        id: upload
   619‚Üí        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   620‚Üí        with:
   621‚Üí          name: app-artifacts
   622‚Üí          path: |
   623‚Üí            app/CHANGELOG.md
   624‚Üí            app/Project.swift
   625‚Üí            app/appcast.xml
   626‚Üí            app/build/artifacts/Tuist.zip
   627‚Üí            app/build/artifacts/Tuist.dmg
   628‚Üí            app/build/artifacts/SHASUMS256.txt
   629‚Üí            app/build/artifacts/SHASUMS512.txt
   630‚Üí          retention-days: 1
   631‚Üí
   632‚Üí  release-ios:
   633‚Üí    name: Release iOS App
   634‚Üí    needs: check-releases
   635‚Üí    if: needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release == 'true'
   636‚Üí    runs-on: namespace-profile-default-macos
   637‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 30
   638‚Üí    steps:
   639‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   640‚Üí        with:
   641‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   642‚Üí          token: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   643‚Üí      - name: Select Xcode
   644‚Üí        run: sudo xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode_$(cat .xcode-version).app
   645‚Üí      - name: Skip Xcode Macro Fingerprint Validation
   646‚Üí        run: defaults write com.apple.dt.Xcode IDESkipMacroFingerprintValidation -bool YES
   647‚Üí      - name: Skip Xcode Package Validation
   648‚Üí        run: defaults write com.apple.dt.Xcode IDESkipPackagePluginFingerprintValidation -bool YES
   649‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
   650‚Üí      - name: Authenticate with Tuist
   651‚Üí        run: tuist auth login
   652‚Üí      - name: Setup Tuist cache
   653‚Üí        run: tuist setup cache
   654‚Üí      - name: Restore cache
   655‚Üí        id: cache-restore
   656‚Üí        uses: actions/cache/restore@v4
   657‚Üí        with:
   658‚Üí          path: .build
   659‚Üí          key: ${{ runner.os }}-app-${{ hashFiles('Package.resolved') }}
   660‚Üí      - name: Update version
   661‚Üí        working-directory: app
   662‚Üí        run: |
   663‚Üí          VERSION_NUMBER="${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version }}"
   664‚Üí          VERSION_NUMBER="${VERSION_NUMBER#app@}"
   665‚Üí          sed -i '' -e "s/CFBundleShortVersionString.*/CFBundleShortVersionString\": \"$VERSION_NUMBER\",/g" "Project.swift"
   666‚Üí          sed -i '' -e "s/CFBundleVersion.*/CFBundleVersion\": \"${{ github.run_number }}\",/g" "Project.swift"
   667‚Üí      - name: Install Tuist dependencies
   668‚Üí        if: steps.cache-restore.outputs.cache-matched-key == ''
   669‚Üí        run: tuist install
   670‚Üí      - name: Generate TuistApp
   671‚Üí        run: mise x -- tuist generate TuistApp --no-binary-cache
   672‚Üí      - name: Upload iOS App to App Store Connect
   673‚Üí        run: mise run app:upload-ios
   674‚Üí        env:
   675‚Üí          OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN }}
   676‚Üí
   677‚Üí  release-server:
   678‚Üí    name: Release Server
   679‚Üí    needs: check-releases
   680‚Üí    if: needs.check-releases.outputs.server-should-release == 'true'
   681‚Üí    runs-on: namespace-profile-default

   683‚Üí    env:

   685‚Üí    outputs:
   686‚Üí      artifacts-uploaded: ${{ steps.upload.outputs.uploaded }}
   687‚Üí      release-notes: ${{ steps.release-notes.outputs.RELEASE_NOTES }}
   688‚Üí    steps:
   689‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   690‚Üí        with:
   691‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   692‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
   693‚Üí
   694‚Üí      - name: Get release notes
   695‚Üí        id: release-notes
   696‚Üí        working-directory: server
   697‚Üí        run: |
   698‚Üí          # Get the latest server version tag
   699‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^server@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   700‚Üí
   701‚Üí          echo "RELEASE_NOTES<<EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   702‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   703‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "server/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   704‚Üí          else
   705‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "server/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   706‚Üí          fi
   707‚Üí          echo "EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   708‚Üí
   709‚Üí      - name: Update CHANGELOG.md
   710‚Üí        working-directory: server
   711‚Üí        run: |
   712‚Üí          # Get the latest server version tag
   713‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^server@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   714‚Üí
   715‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   716‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "server/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD
   717‚Üí          else
   718‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "server/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null
   719‚Üí          fi
   720‚Üí
   721‚Üí      - name: Login to GitHub Container Registry
   722‚Üí        uses: docker/login-action@v3
   723‚Üí        with:
   724‚Üí          registry: ghcr.io
   725‚Üí          username: ${{ github.actor }}
   726‚Üí          password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   727‚Üí
   728‚Üí      - name: Image metadata
   729‚Üí        id: meta
   730‚Üí        uses: docker/metadata-action@v5
   731‚Üí        with:
   732‚Üí          images: |
   733‚Üí            ghcr.io/tuist/tuist
   734‚Üí          flavor: |
   735‚Üí            latest=true
   736‚Üí          tags: |
   737‚Üí            type=raw,value=${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-next-version-number }}
   738‚Üí            type=raw,value=latest
   739‚Üí
   740‚Üí      - name: Build and push
   741‚Üí        uses: docker/build-push-action@v6
   742‚Üí        with:
   743‚Üí          context: .
   744‚Üí          file: ./server/Dockerfile
   745‚Üí          push: true
   746‚Üí          cache-from: type=gha
   747‚Üí          cache-to: type=gha,mode=max
   748‚Üí          build-args: |
   749‚Üí            TUIST_HOSTED=0
   750‚Üí            TUIST_VERSION=${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-next-version-number }}
   751‚Üí            MIX_ENV=prod
   752‚Üí          tags: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}
   753‚Üí          labels: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.labels }}
   754‚Üí
   755‚Üí      - name: Upload Server artifacts
   756‚Üí        id: upload
   757‚Üí        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   758‚Üí        with:
   759‚Üí          name: server-artifacts
   760‚Üí          path: |
   761‚Üí            server/CHANGELOG.md
   762‚Üí          retention-days: 1

   861‚Üí    steps:
   862‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   863‚Üí        with:
   864‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   865‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
   866‚Üí
   867‚Üí      - name: Setup Java
   868‚Üí        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
   869‚Üí        with:
   870‚Üí          distribution: temurin
   871‚Üí          java-version: 21
   872‚Üí
   873‚Üí      - name: Setup Gradle
   874‚Üí        uses: gradle/actions/setup-gradle@v4
   875‚Üí
   876‚Üí      - name: Get release notes
   877‚Üí        id: release-notes
   878‚Üí        run: |
   879‚Üí          # Get the latest gradle version tag
   880‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^gradle@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   881‚Üí
   882‚Üí          echo "RELEASE_NOTES<<EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   883‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   884‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "gradle/**/*" --config gradle/cliff.toml --repository "." 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   885‚Üí          else
   886‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "gradle/**/*" --config gradle/cliff.toml --repository "." 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   887‚Üí          fi
   888‚Üí          echo "EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   889‚Üí
   890‚Üí      - name: Update CHANGELOG.md
   891‚Üí        working-directory: gradle
   892‚Üí        run: |
   893‚Üí          # Get the latest gradle version tag
   894‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^gradle@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   895‚Üí
   896‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   897‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "gradle/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD
   898‚Üí          else
   899‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "gradle/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null
   900‚Üí          fi
   901‚Üí
   902‚Üí      - name: Update minimum Tuist CLI version
   903‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true'
   904‚Üí        run: |
   905‚Üí          sed -i 's/const val MINIMUM_REQUIRED = ".*"/const val MINIMUM_REQUIRED = "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version-number }}"/' gradle/src/main/kotlin/dev/tuist/gradle/TuistBuildCache.kt
   906‚Üí
   907‚Üí      - name: Publish to Gradle Plugin Portal
   908‚Üí        working-directory: gradle
   909‚Üí        run: |
   910‚Üí          PUBLISH_KEY=$(op read "op:REDACTED")
   911‚Üí          PUBLISH_SECRET=$(op read "op:REDACTED")
   912‚Üí          ./gradlew publishPlugins -Pversion=${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-next-version-number }} -Pgradle.publish.key="$PUBLISH_KEY" -Pgradle.publish.secret="$PUBLISH_SECRET"
   913‚Üí        env:
   914‚Üí          OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN }}
   915‚Üí
   916‚Üí      - name: Upload Gradle artifacts
   917‚Üí        id: upload
   918‚Üí        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   919‚Üí        with:
   920‚Üí          name: gradle-artifacts
   921‚Üí          path: |
   922‚Üí            gradle/CHANGELOG.md
   923‚Üí            gradle/src/main/kotlin/dev/tuist/gradle/TuistBuildCache.kt
   924‚Üí          retention-days: 1
   925‚Üí
   926‚Üí  release-skills:
   927‚Üí    name: Release Skills
   928‚Üí    needs: check-releases
   929‚Üí    if: needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release == 'true'
   930‚Üí    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
   931‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 15
   932‚Üí    permissions:
   933‚Üí      id-token: write
   934‚Üí      contents: read
   935‚Üí    env:
   936‚Üí      GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   937‚Üí    outputs:
   938‚Üí      artifacts-uploaded: ${{ steps.upload.outputs.uploaded }}
   939‚Üí      release-notes: ${{ steps.release-notes.outputs.RELEASE_NOTES }}
   940‚Üí    steps:
   941‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   942‚Üí        with:
   943‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   944‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
   945‚Üí
   946‚Üí      - name: Setup Node.js
   947‚Üí        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
   948‚Üí        with:
   949‚Üí          node-version: 24
   950‚Üí          registry-url: https://registry.npmjs.org
   951‚Üí
   952‚Üí      - name: Get release notes
   953‚Üí        id: release-notes
   954‚Üí        run: |
   955‚Üí          # Get the latest skills version tag
   956‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^skills@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   957‚Üí
   958‚Üí          echo "RELEASE_NOTES<<EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   959‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   960‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config skills/cliff.toml --repository "." 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   961‚Üí          else
   962‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config skills/cliff.toml --repository "." 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   963‚Üí          fi
   964‚Üí          echo "EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   965‚Üí
   966‚Üí      - name: Update version
   967‚Üí        working-directory: skills
   968‚Üí        run: npm version ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-next-version-number }} --no-git-tag-version
   969‚Üí
   970‚Üí      - name: Update CHANGELOG.md
   971‚Üí        working-directory: skills
   972‚Üí        run: |
   973‚Üí          # Get the latest skills version tag
   974‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^skills@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   975‚Üí
   976‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   977‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD
   978‚Üí          else
   979‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null
   980‚Üí          fi
   981‚Üí
   982‚Üí      - name: Publish to NPM
   983‚Üí        working-directory: skills
   984‚Üí        run: npm publish --provenance --access public
   985‚Üí
   986‚Üí      - name: Upload Skills artifacts
   987‚Üí        id: upload
   988‚Üí        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   989‚Üí        with:
   990‚Üí          name: skills-artifacts
   991‚Üí          path: |
   992‚Üí            skills/CHANGELOG.md
   993‚Üí            skills/package.json
   994‚Üí          retention-days: 1
   995‚Üí
   996‚Üí  commit-and-release:
   997‚Üí    name: Commit and Release
   998‚Üí    needs:
   999‚Üí      [
  1000‚Üí        check-releases,
  1001‚Üí        release-cli,
  1002‚Üí        release-cli-linux,
  1003‚Üí        release-app,
  1004‚Üí        release-ios,
  1005‚Üí        release-server,
  1006‚Üí        release-cache,
  1007‚Üí        release-gradle,
  1008‚Üí        release-skills,
  1009‚Üí      ]
  1010‚Üí    if: |
  1011‚Üí      !cancelled() && !failure() &&
  1012‚Üí      needs.check-releases.outputs.should-release-any == 'true'
  1013‚Üí    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
  1014‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 30
  1015‚Üí    concurrency:
  1016‚Üí      group: commit-and-release-${{ github.run_id }}
  1017‚Üí      cancel-in-progress: false
  1018‚Üí    env:
  1019‚Üí      GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
  1020‚Üí    steps:
  1021‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
  1022‚Üí        with:
  1023‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
  1024‚Üí          token: ${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
  1025‚Üí
  1026‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
  1027‚Üí
  1028‚Üí      - name: Download CLI artifacts
  1029‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cli.result == 'success'
  1030‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1031‚Üí        with:
  1032‚Üí          name: cli-artifacts
  1033‚Üí
  1034‚Üí      - name: Download CLI Linux x86_64 artifacts
  1035‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cli-linux.result == 'success'
  1036‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1037‚Üí        with:
  1038‚Üí          name: cli-linux-x86_64-artifacts
  1039‚Üí          path: build-linux-x86_64
  1040‚Üí
  1041‚Üí      - name: Download CLI Linux aarch64 artifacts
  1042‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cli-linux.result == 'success'
  1043‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1044‚Üí        with:
  1045‚Üí          name: cli-linux-aarch64-artifacts
  1046‚Üí          path: build-linux-aarch64
  1047‚Üí
  1048‚Üí      - name: Merge Linux artifacts into build directory
  1049‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cli-linux.result == 'success'
  1050‚Üí        run: |
  1051‚Üí          # Append Linux checksums to main checksum files
  1052‚Üí          cat build-linux-x86_64/SHASUMS256.txt >> build/SHASUMS256.txt
  1053‚Üí          cat build-linux-x86_64/SHASUMS512.txt >> build/SHASUMS512.txt
  1054‚Üí          cat build-linux-aarch64/SHASUMS256.txt >> build/SHASUMS256.txt
  1055‚Üí          cat build-linux-aarch64/SHASUMS512.txt >> build/SHASUMS512.txt
  1056‚Üí          # Move Linux tarballs to build directory
  1057‚Üí          mv build-linux-x86_64/tuist-linux-x86_64.tar.gz build/
  1058‚Üí          mv build-linux-aarch64/tuist-linux-aarch64.tar.gz build/
  1059‚Üí
  1060‚Üí      - name: Download App artifacts
  1061‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-app.result == 'success'
  1062‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1063‚Üí        with:
  1064‚Üí          name: app-artifacts
  1065‚Üí          path: app
  1066‚Üí
  1067‚Üí      - name: Download Server artifacts
  1068‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.server-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-server.result == 'success'
  1069‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1070‚Üí        with:
  1071‚Üí          name: server-artifacts
  1072‚Üí
  1073‚Üí      - name: Download Cache artifacts
  1074‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cache.result == 'success'
  1075‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1076‚Üí        with:
  1077‚Üí          name: cache-artifacts
  1078‚Üí
  1079‚Üí      - name: Download Gradle artifacts
  1080‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-gradle.result == 'success'
  1081‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1082‚Üí        with:
  1083‚Üí          name: gradle-artifacts
  1084‚Üí          path: gradle
  1085‚Üí
  1086‚Üí      - name: Download Skills artifacts
  1087‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-skills.result == 'success'
  1088‚Üí        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  1089‚Üí        with:
  1090‚Üí          name: skills-artifacts
  1091‚Üí          path: skills
  1092‚Üí
  1093‚Üí      - name: Create tags for successfully released components
  1094‚Üí        run: |
  1095‚Üí          # Create tags for successfully released components
  1096‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-cli.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1097‚Üí            git tag ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version }}
  1098‚Üí          fi
  1099‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-app.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1100‚Üí            git tag ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version }}
  1101‚Üí          fi
  1102‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-server.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1103‚Üí            git tag ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-next-version }}
  1104‚Üí          fi
  1105‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-cache.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1106‚Üí            git tag ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-next-version }}
  1107‚Üí          fi
  1108‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-gradle.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1109‚Üí            git tag ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-next-version }}
  1110‚Üí          fi
  1111‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-skills.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1112‚Üí            git tag ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-next-version }}
  1113‚Üí          fi
  1114‚Üí
  1115‚Üí      - name: Create CLI GitHub Release
  1116‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cli.result == 'success'
  1117‚Üí        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
  1118‚Üí        with:
  1119‚Üí          draft: false
  1120‚Üí          repository: tuist/tuist
  1121‚Üí          name: CLI ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version-number }}
  1122‚Üí          tag_name: ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version }}
  1123‚Üí          body: ${{ needs.release-cli.outputs.release-notes }}
  1124‚Üí          files: |
  1125‚Üí            build/tuist.zip
  1126‚Üí            build/tuist-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
  1127‚Üí            build/tuist-linux-aarch64.tar.gz
  1128‚Üí            build/SHASUMS256.txt
  1129‚Üí            build/SHASUMS512.txt
  1130‚Üí            build/ProjectDescription.xcframework.zip
  1131‚Üí
  1132‚Üí      - name: Create App GitHub Release
  1133‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-app.result == 'success'
  1134‚Üí        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
  1135‚Üí        with:
  1136‚Üí          draft: false
  1137‚Üí          repository: tuist/tuist
  1138‚Üí          name: App ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version-number }}
  1139‚Üí          tag_name: ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version }}
  1140‚Üí          body: ${{ needs.release-app.outputs.release-notes }}
  1141‚Üí          files: |
  1142‚Üí            app/build/artifacts/SHASUMS256.txt
  1143‚Üí            app/build/artifacts/SHASUMS512.txt
  1144‚Üí            app/build/artifacts/Tuist.dmg
  1145‚Üí
  1146‚Üí      - name: Create Server GitHub Release
  1147‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.server-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-server.result == 'success'
  1148‚Üí        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
  1149‚Üí        with:
  1150‚Üí          draft: false
  1151‚Üí          repository: tuist/tuist
  1152‚Üí          name: Server ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-next-version-number }}
  1153‚Üí          tag_name: ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-next-version }}
  1154‚Üí          body: |
  1155‚Üí            Docker image: `ghcr.io/tuist/tuist:${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-next-version-number }}`
  1156‚Üí
  1157‚Üí            ${{ needs.release-server.outputs.release-notes }}
  1158‚Üí
  1159‚Üí      - name: Create Cache GitHub Release
  1160‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cache.result == 'success'
  1161‚Üí        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
  1162‚Üí        with:
  1163‚Üí          draft: false
  1164‚Üí          repository: tuist/tuist
  1165‚Üí          name: Cache ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-next-version-number }}
  1166‚Üí          tag_name: ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-next-version }}
  1167‚Üí          body: |
  1168‚Üí            Docker image: `ghcr.io/tuist/cache:${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-next-version-number }}`
  1169‚Üí
  1170‚Üí            ${{ needs.release-cache.outputs.release-notes }}
  1171‚Üí
  1172‚Üí      - name: Create Gradle GitHub Release
  1173‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-gradle.result == 'success'
  1174‚Üí        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
  1175‚Üí        with:
  1176‚Üí          draft: false
  1177‚Üí          repository: tuist/tuist
  1178‚Üí          name: Gradle Plugin ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-next-version-number }}
  1179‚Üí          tag_name: ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-next-version }}
  1180‚Üí          body: |
  1181‚Üí            Gradle Plugin Portal: `dev.tuist:${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-next-version-number }}`
  1182‚Üí
  1183‚Üí            ${{ needs.release-gradle.outputs.release-notes }}
  1184‚Üí
  1185‚Üí      - name: Create Skills GitHub Release
  1186‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-skills.result == 'success'
  1187‚Üí        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
  1188‚Üí        with:
  1189‚Üí          draft: false
  1190‚Üí          repository: tuist/tuist
  1191‚Üí          name: Skills ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-next-version-number }}
  1192‚Üí          tag_name: ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-next-version }}
  1193‚Üí          body: |
  1194‚Üí            NPM package: `@tuist/skills@${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-next-version-number }}`
  1195‚Üí
  1196‚Üí            ${{ needs.release-skills.outputs.release-notes }}
  1197‚Üí
  1198‚Üí      - name: Trigger Homebrew Formula Update
  1199‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-cli.result == 'success'
  1200‚Üí        run: |
  1201‚Üí          SHA256=$(cat build/SHASUMS256.txt | grep tuist.zip | awk '{print $1}')
  1202‚Üí          mise run cli:release:homebrew-formula --version "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version }}" --github-token "${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}" --sha256 "$SHA256"
  1203‚Üí
  1204‚Üí      - name: Trigger Homebrew Cask Update
  1205‚Üí        if: needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release == 'true' && needs.release-app.result == 'success'
  1206‚Üí        run: |
  1207‚Üí          SHA256=$(cat app/build/artifacts/SHASUMS256.txt | grep Tuist.dmg | awk '{print $1}')
  1208‚Üí          mise run app:release:homebrew-cask --version "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version-number }}" --github-token "${{ secrets.TUIST_GITHUB_TOKEN }}" --sha256 "$SHA256"
  1209‚Üí
  1210‚Üí      - name: Commit all changes and push
  1211‚Üí        run: |
  1212‚Üí          git config user.name "github-actions"
  1213‚Üí          git config user.email "github-actions@github.com"
  1214‚Üí
  1215‚Üí          # Track if any files were added
  1216‚Üí          FILES_ADDED=false
  1217‚Üí
  1218‚Üí          # Add files from each component that was released
  1219‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-cli.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1220‚Üí            git add cli/CHANGELOG.md cli/Sources/TuistConstants/Constants.swift mise.toml
  1221‚Üí            FILES_ADDED=true
  1222‚Üí          fi
  1223‚Üí
  1224‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-app.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1225‚Üí            git add app/CHANGELOG.md app/Project.swift app/appcast.xml
  1226‚Üí            FILES_ADDED=true
  1227‚Üí          fi
  1228‚Üí
  1229‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-server.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1230‚Üí            git add server/CHANGELOG.md
  1231‚Üí            FILES_ADDED=true
  1232‚Üí          fi
  1233‚Üí
  1234‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-cache.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1235‚Üí            git add cache/CHANGELOG.md
  1236‚Üí            FILES_ADDED=true
  1237‚Üí          fi
  1238‚Üí
  1239‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-gradle.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1240‚Üí            git add gradle/CHANGELOG.md
  1241‚Üí            git add gradle/src/main/kotlin/dev/tuist/gradle/TuistBuildCache.kt || true
  1242‚Üí            FILES_ADDED=true
  1243‚Üí          fi
  1244‚Üí
  1245‚Üí          if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-skills.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1246‚Üí            git add skills/CHANGELOG.md skills/package.json
  1247‚Üí            FILES_ADDED=true
  1248‚Üí          fi
  1249‚Üí
  1250‚Üí          # Only commit if files were added
  1251‚Üí          if [ "$FILES_ADDED" = "true" ]; then
  1252‚Üí            # Check if there are actually changes to commit
  1253‚Üí            if ! git diff --cached --quiet; then
  1254‚Üí              # Create commit message
  1255‚Üí              COMMIT_MSG="[Release]"
  1256‚Üí              if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-cli.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1257‚Üí                COMMIT_MSG="$COMMIT_MSG Tuist CLI ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cli-next-version }}"
  1258‚Üí              fi
  1259‚Üí              if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-app.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1260‚Üí                COMMIT_MSG="$COMMIT_MSG Tuist App ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.app-next-version }}"
  1261‚Üí              fi
  1262‚Üí              if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-server.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1263‚Üí                COMMIT_MSG="$COMMIT_MSG Tuist Server ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.server-next-version }}"
  1264‚Üí              fi
  1265‚Üí              if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-cache.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1266‚Üí                COMMIT_MSG="$COMMIT_MSG Tuist Cache ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.cache-next-version }}"
  1267‚Üí              fi
  1268‚Üí              if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-gradle.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1269‚Üí                COMMIT_MSG="$COMMIT_MSG Gradle Plugin ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.gradle-next-version }}"
  1270‚Üí              fi
  1271‚Üí              if [ "${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release }}" == "true" ] && [ "${{ needs.release-skills.result }}" == "success" ]; then
  1272‚Üí                COMMIT_MSG="$COMMIT_MSG Skills ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-next-version }}"
  1273‚Üí              fi
  1274‚Üí
  1275‚Üí              git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG"
  1276‚Üí            else
  1277‚Üí              echo "No changes to commit"
  1278‚Üí            fi
  1279‚Üí          else
  1280‚Üí            echo "No components were released, skipping commit"
  1281‚Üí          fi
  1282‚Üí
  1283‚Üí          # Push with retry logic
  1284‚Üí          max_attempts=5
  1285‚Üí          attempt=1
  1286‚Üí          while [ $attempt -le $max_attempts ]; do
  1287‚Üí            echo "Attempt $attempt of $max_attempts"
  1288‚Üí            if git pull --rebase origin ${{ github.ref_name }}; then
  1289‚Üí              if git push origin ${{ github.ref_name }} --tags; then
  1290‚Üí                echo "Successfully pushed changes and tags"
  1291‚Üí                break
  1292‚Üí              fi
  1293‚Üí            fi
  1294‚Üí            echo "Push failed, retrying in 5 seconds..."
  1295‚Üí            sleep 5
  1296‚Üí            attempt=$((attempt + 1))
  1297‚Üí          done
  1298‚Üí
  1299‚Üí          if [ $attempt -gt $max_attempts ]; then
  1300‚Üí            echo "Failed to push after $max_attempts attempts"
  1301‚Üí            exit 1
  1302‚Üí          fi
  1303‚Üí

1‚Üí---
     2‚Üíname: using-tuist-generated-projects
     3‚Üídescription: Guides day-to-day work in Tuist-generated Xcode workspaces: generation, build and test commands, and buildable folders. Use when working in a Tuist-generated project or when users mention `tuist generate`, `xcodebuild test`, or generated workspaces.
     4‚Üí---
     5‚Üí
     6‚Üí# Using Tuist Generated Projects
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üí## Quick Start
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üí```bash
    11‚Üí# Generate workspace without opening Xcode
    12‚Üítuist generate --no-open
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí# Build a scheme with xcodebuild
    15‚Üíxcodebuild build -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App
    16‚Üí
    17‚Üí# Run tests with xcodebuild
    18‚Üíxcodebuild test -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme AppTests -only-testing AppTests/MyTestCase
    19‚Üí```
    20‚Üí
    21‚Üí## Project definition
    22‚Üí
    23‚Üí### Prefer buildable folders
    24‚Üí
    25‚ÜíUse `buildableFolders` instead of `sources` and `resources` globs. Buildable folders stay synchronized with the file system, so adding or removing files does not require regeneration.
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí```swift
    28‚Üílet target = Target(
    29‚Üí  name: "App",
    30‚Üí  buildableFolders: [
    31‚Üí    "App/Sources",
    32‚Üí    "App/Resources",
    33‚Üí  ]
    34‚Üí)
    35‚Üí```
    36‚Üí
    37‚Üí### Tag targets for focus
    38‚Üí
    39‚ÜíUse target tags to group areas of the project, for example:
    40‚Üí
    41‚Üí- `tag:team:*`
    42‚Üí- `tag:feature:*`
    43‚Üí- `tag:layer:*`
    44‚Üí
    45‚ÜíThese tags make it easier to scope generation and testing later.
    46‚Üí
    47‚ÜíExample target metadata with tags:
    48‚Üí
    49‚Üí```swift
    50‚Üílet target = Target(
    51‚Üí  name: "PaymentsUI",
    52‚Üí  metadata: .metadata(tags: [
    53‚Üí    "tag:team:commerce",
    54‚Üí    "tag:feature:payments",
    55‚Üí    "tag:layer:ui",
    56‚Üí  ])
    57‚Üí)
    58‚Üí```
    59‚Üí
    60‚ÜíWhen working on a focused area, generate only what you need:
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üí```bash
    63‚Üítuist generate tag:feature:payments
    64‚Üítuist generate PaymentsUI PaymentsTests
    65‚Üí```
    66‚Üí
    67‚Üí### Align build configurations
    68‚Üí
    69‚ÜíKeep build configurations aligned between the project and external dependencies. Use `PackageSettings(settings: .settings(configurations: []))` to mirror project configurations; mismatches emit warnings.
    70‚Üí
    71‚Üí## Workflows
    72‚Üí
    73‚Üí### Generate intentionally
    74‚Üí
    75‚Üí- Use `tuist generate --no-open` in automation and scripts to avoid launching Xcode.
    76‚Üí- Regenerate when any manifest changes (or the dependency graph changes).
    77‚Üí- If generation fails due to missing products, run `tuist install` to resolve dependencies and retry.
    78‚Üí
    79‚Üí### Build with xcodebuild
    80‚Üí
    81‚ÜíUse `xcodebuild build` against the generated workspace and scheme.
    82‚Üí
    83‚Üí```bash
    84‚Üíxcodebuild build \
    85‚Üí  -workspace App.xcworkspace \
    86‚Üí  -scheme App \
    87‚Üí  -destination "generic/platform=iOS Simulator"
    88‚Üí```
    89‚Üí
    90‚Üí### Test with xcodebuild
    91‚Üí
    92‚ÜíUse `xcodebuild test` for running tests locally. Prefer it over `tuist test` because `tuist test` regenerates the project on each invocation, which slows down iteration.
    93‚Üí
    94‚ÜíTo optimize test run time:
    95‚Üí
    96‚Üí- **Use `--only-testing`** to run only the specific test suite or test case you are working on, instead of the full target.
    97‚Üí- **Pick the scheme with the fewest compilation targets** that still includes the test target you need. This minimizes build time before tests run.
    98‚Üí
    99‚Üí```bash
   100‚Üí# Run a specific test suite
   101‚Üíxcodebuild test \
   102‚Üí  -workspace App.xcworkspace \
   103‚Üí  -scheme AppTests \
   104‚Üí  -only-testing AppTests/MyTestSuite
   105‚Üí
   106‚Üí# Run a single test case
   107‚Üíxcodebuild test \
   108‚Üí  -workspace App.xcworkspace \
   109‚Üí  -scheme AppTests \
   110‚Üí  -only-testing AppTests/MyTestSuite/testMyFunction
   111‚Üí```
   112‚Üí
   113‚Üí## Guidelines
   114‚Üí
   115‚Üí- Keep `buildableFolders` paths aligned to the target's real file system layout.
   116‚Üí- Avoid overlapping `buildableFolders` with `sources` or `resources` globs in the same target.
   117‚Üí- Open Xcode manually when needed after running `tuist generate --no-open`.
   118‚Üí
   119‚Üí## Troubleshooting
   120‚Üí
   121‚Üí**Static side effects warnings:** adjust product types deliberately. Use `Target.product` for local targets and `PackageSettings(productTypes:)` for external products. Making everything dynamic with `.framework` can compile and run, but it may hurt launch time. Prefer static products (static frameworks or libraries) when possible and when they do not introduce side effects.
   122‚Üí
   123‚Üí**Objective-C dependency crashes:** add `-ObjC` or `-force_load` via `OTHER_LDFLAGS` on consuming targets as needed. Reference: `https://docs.tuist.dev/en/guides/features/projects/dependencies#objectivec-dependencies`.
   124‚Üí

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

1‚Üí---
     2‚Üíname: migrating-to-tuist-generated-projects
     3‚Üídescription: Migrates existing Xcode projects to Tuist generated workspaces with build and run validation, external dependency mapping, and migration checklists. Use when adopting Tuist for an existing app or converting a hand-edited Xcode project to generated projects.
     4‚Üí---
     5‚Üí
     6‚Üí# Migrating to Tuist Generated Projects
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üí## Quick Start
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üí1. Baseline build and run the app with xcodebuild.
    11‚Üí2. Inventory targets, build settings, and external dependencies.
    12‚Üí3. Create `Tuist.swift`, `Project.swift`, and `Tuist/Package.swift`.
    13‚Üí4. Extract settings into `.xcconfig` files and wire them in `Project.swift`.
    14‚Üí5. Generate and build: `tuist generate --no-open` then `xcodebuild build`.
    15‚Üí6. Fix build issues, regenerate, and validate runtime on a simulator.
    16‚Üí
    17‚Üí## Preflight Checklist
    18‚Üí
    19‚Üí- Primary app scheme and any extension/test schemes
    20‚Üí- Targets list (app, extensions, tests, helper tools)
    21‚Üí- Deployment targets and bundle identifiers
    22‚Üí- Info.plist locations and entitlements
    23‚Üí- Custom build settings (per target and per configuration)
    24‚Üí- External dependencies (SPM, XCFrameworks, local packages)
    25‚Üí- Build scripts (SwiftGen, Sourcery, codegen)
    26‚Üí- Runtime validation plan (simulator destination and launch command)
    27‚Üí
    28‚Üí## Outputs
    29‚Üí
    30‚Üí- `Project.swift` and `Tuist.swift`
    31‚Üí- `Tuist/Package.swift` for external dependencies
    32‚Üí- `.xcconfig` files (optional but recommended)
    33‚Üí- Build and runtime validation notes
    34‚Üí- A short migration log of decisions and fixes
    35‚Üí
    36‚Üí## Migration Workflow
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üí### 1. Baseline the project
    39‚Üí
    40‚ÜíStart by proving the current project builds and runs. Capture the command you use so the generated workspace can be validated the same way.
    41‚Üí
    42‚Üí```bash
    43‚Üíxcodebuild build \
    44‚Üí  -project App.xcodeproj \
    45‚Üí  -scheme App \
    46‚Üí  -configuration Debug \
    47‚Üí  -destination "generic/platform=iOS Simulator" \
    48‚Üí  -derivedDataPath DerivedDataBaseline
    49‚Üí```
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üí### 2. Map targets and settings
    52‚Üí
    53‚ÜíList every target and its role. Extract build settings into `.xcconfig` files when they are large or shared across targets. Keep deployment targets and bundle identifiers identical to the original project to avoid runtime surprises.
    54‚Üí
    55‚Üí### 3. Add Tuist manifests
    56‚Üí
    57‚ÜíCreate the manifests and keep them minimal and close to the existing project.
    58‚Üí
    59‚Üí- `Tuist.swift`: enable generation options you need and keep them explicit.
    60‚Üí- `Project.swift`: define targets, sources, resources, scripts, and dependencies.
    61‚Üí- `Tuist/Package.swift`: list external dependencies and map product types.
    62‚Üí
    63‚ÜíUse `.external` for third-party dependencies to keep the graph consistent.
    64‚Üí
    65‚Üí### 4. Handle sources and resources carefully
    66‚Üí
    67‚ÜíBe precise here. Small mistakes often cause large failures later.
    68‚Üí
    69‚Üí- `.intentdefinition` files belong in `sources`, not `resources`.
    70‚Üí- `.xcstrings` should remain the primary localization source. Avoid double-including `.strings` or `.stringsdict` from overlapping globs.
    71‚Üí- Use `.folderReference` for bundles like `Settings.bundle`.
    72‚Üí- If a resource bundle is missing, ensure the package target declares `.process("Resources")`.
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí### 5. Generate and build
    75‚Üí
    76‚Üí```bash
    77‚Üítuist install
    78‚Üítuist generate --no-open
    79‚Üíxcodebuild build \
    80‚Üí  -workspace App.xcworkspace \
    81‚Üí  -scheme App \
    82‚Üí  -configuration Debug \
    83‚Üí  -destination "generic/platform=iOS Simulator" \
    84‚Üí  -derivedDataPath DerivedDataTuist
    85‚Üí```
    86‚Üí
    87‚Üí### 6. Resolve build issues iteratively
    88‚Üí
    89‚ÜíCommon fixes you will likely need:
    90‚Üí
    91‚Üí- **Missing SDK frameworks**: add `.sdk(name: ..., type: .framework)`.
    92‚Üí- **SPM resource bundles**: verify `.process("Resources")` and `Bundle.module` usage.
    93‚Üí- **File-system-synchronized groups**: avoid over-excluding directories; compare with the pbx if a type vanishes.
    94‚Üí- **Invalid bundle identifiers**: override with `PackageSettings` or vendor a local package.
    95‚Üí- **Generated sources**: ensure codegen outputs (SwiftGen/Sourcery) are part of the build.
    96‚Üí
    97‚Üí### 7. Validate runtime
    98‚Üí
    99‚ÜíA build is not enough; launch the app on a simulator.
   100‚Üí
   101‚Üí```bash
   102‚Üíxcrun simctl boot "iPhone 17 Pro"
   103‚Üíxcrun simctl install booted DerivedDataTuist/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/App.app
   104‚Üíxcrun simctl launch booted com.example.app
   105‚Üí```
   106‚Üí
   107‚Üí## Common Failure Patterns
   108‚Üí
   109‚Üí- **Type not found**: a source file or entire directory was excluded accidentally.
   110‚Üí- **Copy Bundle Resources errors**: Swift files are being treated as resources; fix the resource globs.
   111‚Üí- **Localization conflicts**: `.xcstrings` colliding with `.strings` globs.
   112‚Üí- **Undefined symbols**: missing SDK frameworks or dependency products.
   113‚Üí- **Unrecognized selector at launch**: ObjC categories in static frameworks were stripped. Add `-ObjC` to `OTHER_LDFLAGS` or `-force_load` for the library that defines the category.
   114‚Üí- **Runtime crash on launch**: mismatched bundle id, missing entitlements, or miswired resources.
   115‚Üí
   116‚Üí## Migration Notes to Capture
   117‚Üí
   118‚Üí- What changed in `Project.swift` and why
   119‚Üí- Any exclusions or overrides (and the reason)
   120‚Üí- Dependency patches or local vendoring
   121‚Üí- The exact build and run commands used for validation
   122‚Üí
   123‚Üí## Done Checklist
   124‚Üí
   125‚Üí- Generated workspace builds cleanly
   126‚Üí- App launches on simulator without immediate crash
   127‚Üí- All targets and extensions build
   128‚Üí- Dependencies are wired through `.external`
   129‚Üí- Settings match the original Xcode project
   130‚Üí

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

   927‚Üí    name: Release Skills
   928‚Üí    needs: check-releases
   929‚Üí    if: needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release == 'true'
   930‚Üí    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
   931‚Üí    timeout-minutes: 15
   932‚Üí    permissions:
   933‚Üí      id-token: write
   934‚Üí      contents: read
   935‚Üí    env:
   936‚Üí      GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
   937‚Üí    outputs:
   938‚Üí      artifacts-uploaded: ${{ steps.upload.outputs.uploaded }}
   939‚Üí      release-notes: ${{ steps.release-notes.outputs.RELEASE_NOTES }}
   940‚Üí    steps:
   941‚Üí      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
   942‚Üí        with:
   943‚Üí          fetch-depth: 0
   944‚Üí      - uses: jdx/mise-action@v2
   945‚Üí
   946‚Üí      - name: Setup Node.js
   947‚Üí        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
   948‚Üí        with:
   949‚Üí          node-version: 24
   950‚Üí          registry-url: https://registry.npmjs.org
   951‚Üí
   952‚Üí      - name: Get release notes
   953‚Üí        id: release-notes
   954‚Üí        run: |
   955‚Üí          # Get the latest skills version tag
   956‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^skills@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   957‚Üí
   958‚Üí          echo "RELEASE_NOTES<<EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   959‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   960‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config skills/cliff.toml --repository "." 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   961‚Üí          else
   962‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config skills/cliff.toml --repository "." 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/<!-- RELEASE NOTES START -->/,$p' | tail -n +2 >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   963‚Üí          fi
   964‚Üí          echo "EOF" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
   965‚Üí
   966‚Üí      - name: Update version
   967‚Üí        working-directory: skills
   968‚Üí        run: npm version ${{ needs.check-releases.outputs.skills-next-version-number }} --no-git-tag-version
   969‚Üí
   970‚Üí      - name: Update CHANGELOG.md
   971‚Üí        working-directory: skills
   972‚Üí        run: |
   973‚Üí          # Get the latest skills version tag
   974‚Üí          LATEST_VERSION=$(git tag -l | grep -E "^skills@[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort -V | tail -n1)
   975‚Üí
   976‚Üí          if [ -n "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
   977‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null -- ${LATEST_VERSION}..HEAD
   978‚Üí          else
   979‚Üí            git cliff --include-path "skills/**/*" --config cliff.toml --repository "../" --bump -o CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null
   980‚Üí          fi
   981‚Üí
   982‚Üí      - name: Publish to NPM
   983‚Üí        working-directory: skills
   984‚Üí        run: npm publish --provenance --access public
   985‚Üí
   986‚Üí      - name: Upload Skills artifacts

   993‚Üí            skills/package.json
   994‚Üí          retention-days: 1
   995‚Üí

content.content:
name: Release

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

permissions:
  id-token: write
  contents: write
  pull-requests: read
  statuses: write
  packages: write

concurrency:
  group: release-workflow-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

env:
  PNPM_HOME: ~/.pnpm
  TUIST_ENABLE_CACHING: "true"

jobs:
  check-releases:
    name: Check for releasable changes
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    timeout-minutes: 15
    outputs:
      cli-should-release: ${{ steps.cli-check.outputs.should-release }}
      cli-next-version: ${{ steps.cli-check.outputs.next-version }}

## Summary: Skills Package Publish Pipeline

I've thoroughly explored the Tuist repository's skills directory and publishing pipeline. Here's a comprehensive overview:

### Skills Directory Structure

**Location:** `/Users/pepicrft/src/github.com/tuist/tuist3/skills/`

**Files:**
- `package.json` - NPM package metadata
- `cliff.toml` - Changelog generation configuration (git-cliff)
- `skills/` - Directory containing individual skills:
  - `generated-projects/SKILL.md` - Skill for working with Tuist-generated Xcode projects
  - `migrate/SKILL.md` - Skill for migrating existing projects to Tuist

**Package Details (package.json):**
```json
{
  "name": "@tuist/skills",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "Agent Skills for working with Tuist projects",
  "files": ["skills/"],
  "keywords": ["agent-skills", "tuist", "xcode", "gradle"],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/tuist/tuist",
    "directory": "skills"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "homepage": "https://tuist.dev"
}
```

### Publishing Pipeline

**Workflow:** `.github/workflows/release.yml`

The release pipeline follows a sophisticated multi-component architecture:

#### 1. **Automated Release Detection** (check-releases job)
- Runs on every push to `main` branch
- Uses git-cliff to check for releasable changes in each component
- For skills specifically (lines 334-390):
  - Looks for tags matching pattern: `skills@[0-9].*`
  - Checks commits in `skills/**/*` directory
  - Uses `skills/cliff.toml` configuration
  - Compares changelog content to determine if version bump is needed
  - Outputs `skills-should-release`, `skills-next-version`, and `skills-next-version-number`

#### 2. **Skills Release Job** (release-skills, lines 926-994)
- **Trigger:** Only runs if `check-releases.outputs.skills-should-release == 'true'`
- **Runner:** `ubuntu-latest`
- **Timeout:** 15 minutes
- **Permissions:**
  - `id-token: write` - For OIDC trusted publishing (recommended by NPM)
  - `contents: read`

**Steps:**
1. Checkout repository with full history
2. Install Mise development environment manager
3. Setup Node.js v24 with registry configured to `https://registry.npmjs.org`
4. Extract release notes using git-cliff with skills-specific configuration
5. Update version in package.json using `npm version`
6. Generate CHANGELOG.md using git-cliff
7. **Publish to NPM** using:
   ```bash
   npm publish --provenance --access public
   ```
   - `--provenance`: Generates provenance/SLSA attestation
   - `--access public`: Makes package publicly accessible
8. Upload artifacts (CHANGELOG.md, package.json) for later commit

#### 3. **Authentication & Security**
- **No stored NPM tokens:** Uses GitHub's OIDC trusted publishing (setup-node with registry-url)
- When `registry-url` is set in setup-node, GitHub Actions automatically generates temporary credentials
- The `id-token: write` permission enables OIDC token generation
- This is more secure than storing long-lived NPM tokens

#### 4. **Version Management**
- **Tag Pattern:** `skills@X.Y.Z` (e.g., `skills@0.1.0`)
- **Version Bumping:** Uses `npm version <version> --no-git-tag-version`
- **Version Source:** Determined by git-cliff from commit history
- **Git Commits:** Follows conventional commits with scope `skills`

#### 5. **Changelog Configuration** (cliff.toml)
```toml
[bump]
initial_tag = "0.1.0"

[git]
tag_pattern = "skills@[0-9].*"
skip_tags = "beta|alpha"

[commit_parsers]
# Matches: feat(skills), fix(skills), docs(skills), perf(skills), etc.
{ message = "^feat\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 0 -->‚õ∞Ô∏è  Features" },
{ message = "^fix\\([^)]*\\bskills\\b[^)]*\\)", group = "<!-- 1 -->üêõ Bug Fixes" },
# ... additional parsers
```
- Supports multi-scope commits like `feat(cli,skills)`
- Only includes commits with `skills` scope in release notes

### Commit and Release Phase (lines 996-1303)
After all component releases complete:
1. Downloads artifacts from release jobs
2. Creates git tags for each released component
3. Creates GitHub releases with release notes and artifacts
4. For skills (lines 1185-1196):
   - Tag: `skills@X.Y.Z`
   - Release name: `Skills X.Y.Z`
   - Body includes NPM package reference: `@tuist/skills@X.Y.Z`
5. Commits changes to repo (CHANGELOG.md, package.json)
6. Pushes with retry logic

### Global Workflow Configuration
- **On:** Push to `main` branch
- **Concurrency:** Single release per ref (prevents parallel releases)
- **Global Permissions:**
  - `id-token: write` - OIDC tokens
  - `contents: write` - Git operations
  - `pull-requests: read` - PR info
  - `statuses: write` - Status checks
  - `packages: write` - Container registry (for server/cache)
- **Environment Variables:** `PNPM_HOME=~/.pnpm`, `TUIST_ENABLE_CACHING=true`

### Key Points
1. **No manual secrets for NPM:** Uses OIDC trusted publishing (more secure)
2. **Fully automated:** Detects releasable changes automatically
3. **Multi-component:** Skills release alongside CLI, Server, App, Cache, Gradle
4. **Provenance:** Generates SLSA provenance attestations for supply chain security
5. **Public access:** Packages published with `--access public` flag
6. **Git integration:** Uses conventional commits and git tags for versioning

### Dependencies
- Git-cliff (Rust tool for changelog generation)
- Node.js 24
- pnpm (implicitly available via mise)
- Setup-node GitHub Action for OIDC configuration
